1.content:
Gabe:- slightly chubby 13 year old. Enjoys video games. Has a 28 inch waist with no defined muscles. His belly sticks out and hangs over his belt slightly.

Pj:- thin 17 year old. Has a 30 inch waist and slightly visible abs. Delivers fried chicken as a job.

Bob:- father of pj, teddy, gabe and Charlie. Has a 36 inch waist. Is a bug exterminator.

Spencer:- teddys boyfriend. 16 years old. Thin. Has a 30 inch waist. Enjoys dancing.
1.title: Who gains?

choices: Got more food from the kitchen
11.content: Gabe sleeps in one morning while the rest of the family are going out for the day. Not wanting to disturb him, they left him home alone. About 30 minutes after they all left he woke up. He rubbed his soft, hungry belly. He got dressed and went to the kitchen. He put a chair in front of the fridge and started eating everything, but leaving the vegetables behind. He then noticed pj had bought him a new video game, so he made a big bowl of popcorn and started playing. Before he knew it the popcorn was gone. He finished his game but was too full to move. He started playing with his belly. He sucked in his belly and tightened his belt, and by then he had digested some food and was hungry again. He sttod up, forgetting that his black leather belt was still tight, and relaxed his belly. His belt snapped, leaving him in need of a belt, however he only had one. He decided to raid pj's room To find one, and he found a brown one which was about 1 inch wide. He put it on and it fit perfectly. Next he:
11.title: Gabe

111.content:
raided the whole kitchen. He took every sweet and sugary snack in sight. He pulled pulled out a tray and stacked several burgers that he heated in the microwave. He stuck everything in his mouth almost at once. He walked to his gaming room and sat down on his chair and turned on his device. He prompt himself up and heard a gurgle from his belly. He stuck another chocolate bar into his face that he took from one of the cabinets. The belt from PJ’s room already felt tight. He loosened it and finally was able to breathe. He put on his headset and played for several hours. Without noticing, PJ walked into the room. He must’ve just gotten back. Gabe was dressed in a light blue polo shirt and khaki shorts that barely let him squeeze into. His face was covered in chocolate and crumbs. “I see you found the game I got you,” PJ says as he crouches down next to Gabe.
“Mhm,” Gabe replies as he inhales several other chips.
“What made you have such a large appetite today?”
“I’m just hungry.” Gabe mumbles. Gabe felt a little bit embarrassed to be seen like this in front of his brother. PJ didn’t really seem to care that much. “I just felt like I needed some food while playing this awesome new game. Thanks by the way.”
“It’s cool bro, anyway, since you’re hungry, there’s a new buffet place down the street! Are you down to come?”
111.title: Got more food from the kitchen

choices: Stay home and invite friends over.
1112.content:
PJ head out and locked the door behind him. Gabe continued to feast and his stomach quickly grew along. His waist grew from 28 in to 30 in. He played the game continuously until Bob walked in. He kneeled down to scare Gabe. Instead, Bob got scared. Gabe let out an outrageous burp. “Excuse you, Gabe!”
“Oh, Dad! Didn’t see you there.” Gabe said while staring at the television screen.
“Mom, Teddy, and Charlie are having a girls’ night and I was wondering if you and PJ wanted to go get some treats.”
“Sure, when?”
“When PJ gets back we’ll probably get going.”
“Ok, Dad.” Gabe says after letting out another burp.
“Oh, son. I also got you these. Share with your brother.”
Bob handed Gabe three candy packages, a chocolate cake, and two quarts of ice cream. Gabe licked his lips and dug in. He totally forgot about sharing with PJ. Gabe felt bloated, so he had to take his shirt off. His belly fell over his belt and expanded furthermore. He continued to play the game as melted ice cream dropped down his face and over his forming man boobs. Gabe was living the gamer boy life. He chugged several Cokes and ate the rest of the treats that were supposed to be for the two boys. A few movements later, PJ walked into the room. Gabe looked over and PJ had been bloated to the max. “I thought I was getting kind of chubby, looks like you took the cake.”
“I’m not getting fat, I’m rounding out.”
“Oh, you actually did take the cake I see.” PJ looked down to Gabe’s shorts. They were covered with chocolate hand prints.
“I haven’t gained a single pound, it’s just Dad’s genes.”
“Last time I checked, Dad didn’t have moobs!” PJ said laughing.
“What moobs?” Gabe said defensively.
PJ grabbed ahold of Gabe’s newly formed breasts and jiggled them with his hands. “These ones.”
Gabe blushed and put his hands over his gut. Quickly, he lifted up PJ’s shirt to reveal a belly that hadn’t been that grown at all. PJ laughed and stuff his finger in Gabe’s belly button and walked out of the room laughing.
Gabe was embarrassed but he liked how PJ touched him like that. It felt good. Gabe liked the gamer boy lifestyle. He didn’t want to care about being healthy. He wanted to just give up. “Hey Gabe, you coming?”
1112.title: “I’d rather not.”

choices: Own up to the fact you gained weight.
Go to the bathroom and leave.
11121.content:
Bob, PJ, and Gabe walk to the car and get in. They order pizza and Gabe eats 3/4 of it. This was obviously expected. Bob orders several cakes and Gabe ate all of them. Fast foot. Gabe ate all of them. Several desserts. Gabe. Burgers and fries. Gabe. “I’m a little bit hungry” Gabe says.
“Okay, big bro. Well let’s not get out of control. We have to get you suit fitting.” PJ says.
“Suit fitting!” Gabe says as he scarfs down a whole new two slices of pizza.
“There’s a wedding on Thursday that the girls aren’t interested in going in. That’s why they left!” Bob replies.
The car pulls up to the suit fitters and Gabe wobbles out of the car with a pot belly that doubled in size. Bob peers down at it and looks concerned. “Lay back on the sweets, Gabe.”
Gabe rolls his eyes and PJ looks down at his stomach. It grew a bit more too. They walk in and the suiter greets us. He shakes all of our hands and takes us to the measurement room. He already prepared us with three suits with our last measurements in place on them. Gabe burps. The last time he got measured was when he was in seventh grade. He quit sports and started to get involved in the gaming career instead of school. Gabe gulps. PJ tries on the prepared suit first. He buttons up the pants and buttons the shirts. He pulls up the trousers over his stomach and it fits just right. PJ let’s out a breath and you can see his belly protrudes a little. Bob was next. His suit fit perfectly due to his new activity in older men’s football. I was next so I stood up on the heightened softened circle in the middle of the room. “Do I have to do it front of you guys?” Gabe asks.
They all nod. Gabe takes off how greasy shirt and sets it aside to reveal a full potbelly full of treats. He takes off his pants and reveals massive thighs he’s been hiding. Gabe can already tell the suit won’t fit. He puts on the shirt first which doesn’t button. The pants didn’t go up around his waist due to his love handles in the way. Gabe burps as he sucks in. PJ insists to help so he gets up and holds Gabe’s tummy back to get the pants on. He helps Gabe button his shirt. It was extremely tight. “It fits!” Gabe exclaims.
PJ oinks to mock Gabe’s weight gain. Gabe breathes and a button flies across the room. PJ starts laughing.
11121.title: Go to boy’s night.

111211.content:
Gabe starts laughing too. PJ hugs Gabe and their bellies touch. “I see I’m not the only one who’s been eating!” Gabe whispers.
“You’ll always be the fatter brother.” PJ chuckles.
Bob steps in and pats his stomach, “I’ll always be the fattest!”
Gabe rubs Bob’s belly and says, “Teach me your ways.”
They all laugh together as Gabe gets remeasured. His waist increases 4 inches. His chest increased 8 inches. Gabe only grew a half inch taller. “Dang, no wonder that thing didn’t fit!”
The suiter smiles as he picks out a suit. He picks out a three-piece tuxedo. “Will this work?”
They all nod. Gabe puts it on and it fits perfectly. He turns around to look at the back. PJ smacks Gabe’s butt and says,”Looking a little bit juicy.” He mocks me.
“You’re rude,” Gabe modestly replies.
Gabe takes of the tuxedo and folds it and gives it to the suiter. They leave the tuxedo shop and go to an all-you-can-eat buffet. Gabe and PJ instantly dig in. One of the workers asks if Gabe would like to participate in their ice cream bowl challenge.
111211.title: Own up to the fact you gained weight.

1112111.content:
The waiter leads Gabe to a room and grips his arm tightly. The waiter locks the door and pulls out a chair and straps Gabe into it. “This is a weird challenge?” Gabe laughs.
“Don’t worry, it’ll be fun” the waiter says as he tightens Gabe to the chair. Gabe burps and groans.
The waiter smiles as he pulls out a funnel and sticks it into a Gabe’s mouth. “What are you doing” Gabe says, but it’s muffled by the funnel in his mouth.
The waiter stands up behind Gabe and starts shoveling melted ice cream into the funnel. Gabe starts getting filled up with it. Gabe struggles for about two minutes, but he just becomes comfortable. The waiter has went through ten quarts of melted ice cream. Gabe starts forming a round pot belly full of ice cream. He groans in pain. The waiter laughs and starts putting more and more food into the funnel. He starts putting cream into it to make Gabe pack on the pounds a little bit faster. Gabe becomes satisfied with this new activity he’s stumbled on. He felt comfortable and safe. The waiter hooks up a machine to the funnel. It squeezes out nonstop cream. The waiter walks over to the front of Gabe and lifts up his shirt. Two glorious man boobs have sprouted even further. A belly big enough to hold a cow is shown under his shirt. After about two more hours, Gabe is unhooked from the machine. He ripped his shorts and shirt. Gabe is speechless and is upset when he stops getting fed. The waiter smiles at Gabe as he hands him a number. The waiter has Gabe stand up and pats him on the back. Gabe refuses to leave and turns around towards the waiter. “My stomach hurts.” Gabe says while burping.
The waiter doesn’t speak, instead he pulls off Gabe’s shirt and starts rubbing his bloated, soft stomach. Gabe moans and groans. It felt so good to him.
1112111.title: Participate?

choices: Jacob smacks it and squeezes it.

11121111.content:
“What is your name?” Gabe asks as the waiter massages his stomach.
“I’m Jacob.” he replies.
“Oh, I’m G-“
“I know who you are.” Jacob interrupts.
“Look, I’m going to need some clothes, I can’t walk out like this.”
“I have some of clothes in my locker, I’ll go get you some.” Jacob says speedily.
Jacob has brown hair and was pretty tall. He looked to be around 16 or 17. Jacob was really handsome, but Gabe isn’t gay. Jacob comes back with a blue striped button down and khaki shorts with a black belt. Jacob also brought a hat, socks, and a a couple dress shoes. “I brought a whole outfit.”
Gabe smiles as Jacob hands him his new clothes. “Okay, well I’ll change now.” Gabe signals Jacob out of them room.
“I won’t look.” Jacob insists.
Gabe smirks and waits until Jacob turns around. He takes off his shirt and shorts. He puts on the button down first. It’s a little bit long, but his new belly fills it out. The bottom two buttons barely fit. He puts on the khaki shorts, they don’t fit. “Hey, Jacob. Your shorts don’t fit.”
Gabe turns around and sees Jacob already looking at him. “Fatty!” Jacob laughs.
Gabe blushes as he attempts to pull the shorts up his waist again. They fail to get up onto them. “I mean look at you, you’re 13 and already have a beer belly!”
“Yeah, and you’re so perfect.” Gabe says rudely.
“C’mon piggy, you know I am.” Jacob says gesturing his glorious set of abs.
Gabe blushes and finally gets the khaki shorts on. They emphasize his butt really well. He tucks in the buttoned-shirt and puts on the belt. The whole outfit was tight. Gabe puts on the socks and shoes along with the hat. Not going to lie, Gabe looked awesome in the outfit. Gabe takes out his phone and uses it as a mirror. As he looks to see his butt..

112112.content:
"Sorry, Gabe. You did great out there, really, it's just that some of the other boys worked harder this year than you did. There's no room left for you on the team, bud," the coach informed Gabe sympathetically. "If you really work hard, you could make it back on the team by this time next year, though!"
         Gabe thanked the coach for his consideration and his advice, then walked off the field. After all the hard work he put in during his tryout, he decided to stop back into the snack bar and refuel. He bought himself a couple extra hot dogs and a large soda, but the bored-looking teen working the stand accidentally messed up his order and, as an apology, gave him double the order for free. With Gabe's belly getting increasingly full, gaps appeared between the buttons of his uniform. He got a refill of his soda before heading off back home.
         Once he arrived at the house, he finished the last of his soda and let out a large belch before climbing the stairs and entering his bedroom for a nap. When he sat down on the bed to take his shoes off, his pants buttons burst open, allowing his stuffed gut to surge forward into his lap. The sudden outward motion of his belly then cause the lower shirt buttons to pop off as well. Looking down at his gut, Gabe's eyes widened. He tentatively put a hand on his exposed belly and found a thick layer of squishy flab covering the tight, round stomach beneath. He let out a deep breath and lay back on the bed, massaging his full gut to release the pressure he felt. "I suppose I ate a little much today with that free food I got...but I'm not fat right?" Pushing in on his belly again and feeling the hard stomach beneath his fat, he said "Nah, I'm just bloated," and let out a rumbling fart. He kept massaging his belly until he fell into a comfortable sleepy state with his gut on proud display for all the world to see.
112112.title: Off the Team

11211222.content:
PJ thought that Gabe might not go along with the plan if PJ told him, so he decided to help Gabe grow in more subtle ways. As PJ had just gotten home from working at Kwikki Chikki, he had brought his free employee meal home with him. He set a pair of stretchy pajama pants and a bigger shirt on Gabe's bed before he woke up, leading Gabe to believe his mom had just set out clothes for him. PJ then woke Gabe up abruptly by unceremoniously jumping on his brother's bed, acting as though he just walked into the room. "Hey, little bro. You hungry?"
         Gabe opened his eyes slowly. He groggily replied, "What...yeah actually...Do I smell fried chicken??"
         "Yeah I actually already ate and I have this left over so I thought you'd want it," PJ said, offering Gabe the big bag of fast food. "Mom is also making dinner, though, so make sure she doesn't know you're spoiling your appetite haha. There's a chocolate shake over here too."
         "Thanks bro!" Gabe exclaimed happily, realizing his wardrobe malfunction as he sat up. "Turn around, will you? I've gotta change out of this old baseball uniform." Gabe grabbed the clothes PJ had laid out and began stripping down once PJ was looking the other way.
         "Oh, yeah, you had baseball tryouts today, huh? How did that go?" PJ inquired.
"It was okay. The coach said I did great, but I just wasn't as great as some other kids. I didn't make the team this year." Gabe sounded a bit dejected as he let out a sigh while pulling his pants on. With his stretchier comfy clothes on, you couldn't tell that Gabe's belly had grown at all.
         "That's too bad," PJ sympathized and handed Gabe the full chicken meal. "I'm gonna go down and see if Mom wants any help with dinner."
         "Alright. Thanks again, PJ." Gabe said as he dug into his chicken. "This stuff is really good!"
         "Don't forget the shake!" PJ called as he made his way down the stairs.

"Man, PJ, that stuff was all really good," Gabe said as he rubbed his full belly, "The only thing missing is a good dessert!"
         Gabe had meant this as a bit of a joke, and was surprised when PJ said, "Well I guess you're in luck then, little bro." Gabe turned his head and with wide eyes saw PJ pulling a fresh pan of brownies out of the oven. He placed the tray in front of Gabe and went to grab ice cream from the freezer.
         Gabe was already feeling full, but the smell of the brownies distracted him. "Wow...they...smell really good. I might as well have them when they're still warm though, huh?" Gabe reasoned with himself. "They won't be nearly as good later on." PJ began to cut the brownies and plopped a sizable one on a plate for Gabe. He then proceeded to pile ice cream on the top and drizzle it all with chocolate sauce. Gabe's mouth was watering by the time Gabe provided him with a fork, and he began to shovel it into his mouth rapidly. While Gabe was eating, PJ kept discreetly adding more to his plate so that he seemingly never ran out of food, until Gabe had eventually fit the whole pan of brownies into his gut. With his gut so round and heavy in his lap, Gabe seemed rather disoriented. He just rubbed his belly and burped while PJ cleared away the dishes.
         This is all working perfectly! PJ thought to himself, before helping Gabe drowsily heave himself out of his chair. PJ led his stuffed, waddling brother up to their bedroom and into bed where Gabe passed out almost instantly. PJ sat on the edge of Gabe's bed for awhile, rubbing his belly to ease the pressure and ensure a comfortable rest.
         PJ gave Gabe's belly a final pat before covering him in blankets and making his way to his own bed for the night.

Gabe's eyes fluttered open as the morning sunlight hit his face. He rolled over groggily and found himself thudding against the floor. The sound woke up PJ, who soon began to get ready for school. Gabe grabbed a pair of jeans and began to get dressed, but had to struggle to get his pants over his thicker thighs and bigger butt up to his waist. He tried to button the jeans, but couldn't get the two sides to come together. He jumped up and down, sucked in his gut, and did everything he could to get them on, but they just would not button over his newly acquired flab.
         PJ noticed Gabe's struggles and said, "Oh, shoot. Gabe, I tried to help Mom with the laundry last night, but I think I shrank everything. Here, try a pair of mine."
         Gabe put on the pants PJ held out to him and buttoned them with ease beneath his bigger belly. He figured his shirts had shrunk too, and had to borrow that from PJ as well. Soon, their mom called them downstairs to breakfast, and Gabe had quite the feast of pancakes, bacon, sausage, and eggs. He served himself as much as he could get before it was time to depart for school, and his belly rounded out comfortably beneath his baggy, borrowed clothes.

Gabe woke up to the jarring sound of his alarm and rolled to the side of the bed where he then sat up and stretched out his back, his shirt rising up in the process. When he set about changing into a fresh set of clothes in the morning, he struggled to put them on. He pulled on a button-up shirt and had to suck in his gut to force all of the buttons together, but eventually managed to get it done. He then moved on to his pants, pulling them up to his thighs and then struggling to get them up further. He eventually managed to force them over his bigger, rounder butt and up to his waist where his stubborn belly blocked any means of buttoning them. PJ came upstairs to inform Gabe that breakfast was ready when he saw his brother's predicament. Unbeknownst to Gabe, PJ had actually just bought this larger pair of pants to help hide Gabe's growing belly from both himself and their parents. While Gabe was downstairs, PJ replaced most of Gabe's old clothes with larger sizes.

He sat down and dug in with gusto, filling his plate as much as he could manage. He scarfed it all down fairly quickly and didn't stop until he felt he couldn't eat another bite. Once his large breakfast was resting comfortably in his rounded gut, the fabric of his shirt formed gaps between the buttons, revealing several inches of creamy, white, and fatty flesh bulging out. He pulled on a large sweater before he left, however, covering this fact for himself and everyone around him.

112232212222.content:
After a year of eating various (and numerous) desserts religiously, each day eating more than the last, the now 14-year-old Gabe had gained a lot. Each of the massive wedding cakes the first day was well over 20,000 calories. He made sure not to leave a single crumb, while he was absolutely stuffed (possibly on the verge of popping), he was determined to milk the man for all he was worth. His humongous bulbous gut turned into a little over 700lbs over the course of a week of stuffing (his belly was still stretching and digesting at that point, so he couldn't eat much) and afterwards, he got exponentially bigger. The Wonka Candy Company officially sponsored his growth and hired him as their official taste tester. The blob of a boy stopped playing (or rather, couldn't play because of his sausage-like fingers) video games and dedicated himself completely to his gluttony, feeding every moment he was awake.
Among the things he liked most, frobscottle and Flatus Fudge were his favorites. They were meant to be prank candies, which made the victim fart uncontrolably. He liked the way his muti-ton body jiggled when he farted. Of course, it didn't smell great, but then again, cleaning a 16-ton pubescent boy wasn't easy, and he liked being a big fat piggy (specifically, jiggling when he farts). He was treated like a king, so they couldn't do anything about it.

13.content: Bob Duncan knew his body pretty well. But when he got on the scale in the morning and it weighed 230, rather than the normal 220, he was surprised. He wasn’t trying to gain weight, but he was! He then went to measure his waist, and it was 37 inches rather than the regular 36. When he put on his shirt, it felt tighter everywhere. Bob felt amazing, he felt like he could eat a horse and lift a ton. He was starving, so he raided the pantry. He ate, and ate, and ate until everything was almost gone. What he didn’t notice was that he was gaining weight and size. His waist slowly grew from 37 to 42, and his whole body expanded. He wasn’t only gaining weight, but muscle too. His big, beefy biceps strained against his shirt, and his gut pushed his shirt out and above. He had now had abs, but it looked like a roid gut. He unconsciously loosened his belt, slowly to the very last notch. Bob moaned in delight as his belt snapped and his gut flew out. He walked to the bathroom, his footfalls heavy with power, as he went to the scale. 300 pounds?! He then proceeded to measure his waist, which was now 45 inches. He moaned in delight as he found his hands roaming his new fatty, but muscular body. He realized he wanted more, more size, more everything.

it was day 8, and Spencer had eaten from this new bakery by his job every single day after work. He stuffed himself full with their delicious cakes and desserts, and Spencer couldn't help himself. One day, Spencer and Pj were walking around (they had become close friends now), and they passed by the bakery.
"Pj! You have to check this out, their food is amazing!" Spencer lef Pj into the bakery.
"Hey Spencer, the usual?" the worker asked, knowing Spencer well now.
"Make it 2!" Spencer said.
Soon, the lady came out with 10 full chocolate and vanilla cakes, and other assorted desserts around it.
"This is your usual?" Pj asked in shock.
"Yep, you better get started before I finish yours!" Spencer said and stuffed a piece of cake in his mouth.
Pj thought this was ridiculous, but took a bite anyways.
"Oh my god..." Pj said, and stuffed his face with as much food as possible. Spencer did the same. After a few minutes, the boys had finished, and the female worker came back.
"That'll be-" she started.
"Uhm, excuse me, can we double that order?" Pj asked. Spencer nodded in agreement. She soon came back with 10 more cakes and the teens chowed down.

1 week later, the boys keeping at this pace everyday, Spencer's belt snapped in the midst of his eating. This was the first time he was acknowledged of his weight gain. Spencer lifted his shirt and gasped at his belly. His dark happy trail led to a deep belly button and a basketball of fat.

"196?!" Spencer gasped in shock. "I gained 16 pounds? I've got to watch my weight..."

The next day when Spencer left his job, he saw Pj stuffing himself with cakes. He smelt the desserts. He wanted soo badly to go in, but he had to resist. Spencer walked to the crosswalk and waiting for the signal, and seconds later he ran into the shop and ate with Pj
1411.title: spencer weighs himself

14111.content:
1 week later, and another week of stuffing, Spencer entered his modeling company's building, and was called to the manager's office.
"Spencer, we've noticed lately you've gained a bit... of, uhm weight."
"I didn't notice..." Spencer lied.
"Well, you need to slim up, we need to keep you slim and healthy if you want to work here. So hit the gym and get yourself together!" he said.

Spencer left the building and after a hard day, would've loved to eat the foods. He considered his options, and figured one more day of eating wouldn't do harm, he'll work out tomorrow.
14111.title: the modeling company noticed Spencer's weig...

choices: pjs family notice his weight gain
spencers family notices his weight gain
141111.content:
Pj and Spencer started their days at the bakery eating 10 desserts. Now, however, their love to the food has increased, and after 3 weeks of eating their everyday, until they could barely move, brought them up to eating 25 full cakes, not slices. Pj was eating his 13th cake for the day, and POP! His button from his jeans popped off, and Pj noticed his weight.
"Woah, look at this thing..." Pj said, revealing his big belly.
"Look at this" Spencer said and showed his larger belly.
"Have we been gaining weight?" Pj asked.
"Youre a lil late bro!" Spencer said, and stuffed a cake in his moth. Pj shrugged and continued eating.
141111.title: Pj and Spencer's appetite increase

1411111.content:
Another week later, none of Pj's clothes covered his large growing belly. One night when Pj was about to fall asleep, Gabe entered the room.
"Gabe?! What do you want?!" he asked.
"I want answers." Gabe said.
"What?" Pj said, annoyed since he wanted sleep.
"Where did this come from?" Gabe asked, and pated Pj's big belly.
"No where, go away!" Pj said and turned the other way.
Gabe went back to his room, and decided to follow Pj the next day.

Gabe's plan went into action as Gabe followed Pj to the bakery. There was Spencer already eating, and they ordered a huge meal. Gabe bought one small slice of cake, and became endursed in the taste like the others. Pj saw Gabe eating away, and confrontef him.
"Gabe?" Pj asked.
"Heydh!" Gabe said and stuffed another piece of cake in his mouth.
"What are you doing?" Pj asked.
"Enjoying myself!" Gabe said and ate on, and invited him to the table where he and Spencer sat. Ths 3 ate on, and the bench that sat on had more and more strain.
1411111.title: pjs family notice his weight gain

14111111.content:
3 week later, the boys only ate more from the bakery. They were constantly chowing down on the food, and when they weren't, Spencer was at work. One day, while changing into his button down shirt to model off, he couldn't get the last 3 buttons on. He couldn't reach them over his large hairy belly.
"ONE MINUTE WALSH!" Spencer's boss yelled from outside. Spencer took off the shirt and looked for something to help him suck in his gut. Finally, he found a gurdle which happened to be 3 sizes too small, but he ignored it and put it on. With a little less effort, Spencer put on his shirt and walked outside.

Spencer posed for the camera, and they had him sit down. When he sat, the gurdlr busted open, flinging 5 buttons off his shirt and everyone saw his gigantic belly. "What did I say about this?!" His boss yelled. "You're fired!" Spencer took off, completely mad at his boss. So what that he gained like, 10 pounds? Spencer decided to go into the bakery right next door, and he saw Pj and Gabe already there.

"What are you guys doing here? Don't you have work, and school?" Spencer asked. "We've been skipping." Pj said between mouthfulls. He noticed that their guts had too, ripped open their shirts and they ddin't seem bothered. Spencer ordered his usual and began shoving the delicious food down his throat. He then took a look at Pj. Was his gut bigger than his?
14111111.title: Spencer's career

choices: Pj gets huge and Spencer loses weight
141111112.content: He asked pj to stand up which was now a challenge because he rounded out pretty well but when he did with a mouth full of cake he said "what?" Pj said wanting to stuff more cake in His face "Is your gut bigger then mine" Spencer asked confused "probably" pj said with a triumphant tone Spencer then looked down at Gabe who had easily gained 50lbs in a month but he was nothing compared to Spencer and pj "let's go weigh ourselves" Spencer said Hoping he was bigger fine they both waddled over to the Duncan house where they both stripped naked and steped on the scale "ha! 250" pj exclaimed looking past his faint happy trail while Spencer got ready to step on the scale he looked at PJs butt which a lot of fat had gathered and it was now nice and round Spencer then stepped on the scale and looked past his vast belly and thick dark happy trail "ha! 300 even" the floor groaned as there was 550lbs of pressure on it "we should probably get some clothes now" Spencer said sounding nervous "yea " pj said quickly the two boys went into Bob and Amy's room where they stole Bob's fat clothes which nearly fit them they then went back to the bakery to see Gabe completely ripped out of his clothes so they put a blanket around him and orderd 30 more cakes each
141111112.title: Spencer is still bigger

info.brief_description: Guys from the Disney series pack on the pounds
info.description:
Characters from the Disney series "good luck Charlie" will pack on the pounds.
RULES:-
MALE weight gain ONLY
NO female weight gain (females can be in the story, but keep the gaining for the guys).
All male characters wear belts.
Sweat pants, jogging bottoms, whatever you want to call them, are NOT allowed in this story.
No "suddenly he woke up and he was 99999999 pounds!"
Males must measure their waist size as well as weight.
Try to keep weights to a sensible amount
HAVE FUN!!!
